executionDetails: Proposed changes to workspace initialization scripts to copy .rdd/templates/copilot-prompts.md to .rdd-docs/workspace/copilot-prompts.md for both enhancement and fix flows. Implementation should add a copy step in init_workspace for both change and fix types. No files were modified yet, only analysis and proposal completed.
Added copy_template call for copilot-prompts.md in workspace-utils.sh init_workspace() function. Template is now copied to .rdd-docs/workspace/ for both enh and fix workflow types.

Removed create_open_questions_template() call from workspace-utils.sh init_workspace() function. The open-questions.md file is now only created during the clarification phase (clarify-utils.sh), not during initial workspace setup.
